pageProduct.name: Redwin Sorbolene Moisturiser with Vitamin E Litre 1
pageProduct.description:
General Information

with 10% plant derived glycerine
restoring with vitamin E

Redwin sensitive skin sorbolene moisturiser softens skin and can make it feel silky smooth and clean. The soothing nature of the cream makes it a preferred moisturiser for dry and sensitive skin, suitable for the whole family.
- Fragrance free
- Colour free
- pH balanced

What Is Redwin Sorbolene With Vitamin E For?
Effective daily moisturisation for the whole family. Sorbolene leaves your skin smooth and moisturised whilst added vitamin e gives antioxidant support and aids healthy skin.
Who Is Redwin Sorbolene With Vitamin E For?
Anyone wanting a multi-benefit body lotion that provides intensive nourishment while at the same time enhances their skins natural beauty.
When Should I Use Redwin Sorbolene With Vitamin E?
Use twice daily for maximum results, particularly after showering or exposure to wind or sun.
Why Should I Use Redwin Sorbolene With Vitamin E?
Provides deep hydration for soft and smooth skin and relief from dryness and itching. For all-over-moisturisation at a value price.

Suitable For: Suitable for the whole family.

Size: 1L

Warnings

For external use only. Keep away from eyes.

Ingredients

Water, glycerine, sorbitol, stearic acid, mineral oil, cetearyl alcohol, triethanolamine, triticum vulgare, germ oil, imidazolidinyl, urea, soduim benzoate, chloroacetamide, tetrasodium edta, p-chloro-m-cresol.

Suitable for a halal diet

Contains: n/a

Allergen Contains: Null

Allergen May Be Present: Null

Allergen Free From: n/a

Directions

For best results apply a small amount to your skin and once absorbed continue to re-apply.

Use every day after showering and after sun exposure

Also, available in body wash and hand wash.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C

Storage Temperature: 30°C
